about_the_game:
"Enze: The Unbidden Grace" is an action-adventure game set in an alternate world.

Game Features

  • The character and environment designs are heavily inspired by ancient Chinese mythology and folklore.

  • A vast world contained within a small universe: every scene is part of a larger narrative that unfolds as you explore.

  • A wealth of random drops and stat-based progression. The same weapon can offer completely different combat experiences depending on how you build your character.

  • A magic system inspired by "Vampire Survivors" mechanics, where basic spells combined with different stats make battles much more manageable.

Story Background

About 600 years ago, an unexpected catastrophe nearly wiped out all of human civilization. But those who survived the disaster underwent strange transformations—gaining an unnatural longevity and health beyond what anyone before them could have imagined. In just a few centuries, new life began to flourish across the wastelands, even surpassing the glory of the old civilizations.

But humanity wasn’t the only species to evolve. Many creatures, too, underwent strange changes, becoming sentient beings and gradually taking on human forms.

People began to call this era the "Age of All Life."

The world, shattered by the disaster, is now divided into multiple continents, with mysterious zones emerging in the aftermath. Some places are rife with danger, where life and death are uncertain. Others are eerily silent, devoid of anything, as if frozen in time. Over time, these places became forbidden zones, avoided by nearly everyone.

Except for the “Dreamspeakers.”

In this world, some individuals occasionally dream of a giant who speaks to them in cryptic words, guiding them toward these forbidden zones. The words are hard to understand, but they seem to carry an irresistible power, driving the dreamers forward into the unknown.

The protagonist of the story—Enze, a young girl—was one of those called by the giant. She embarks on a journey into the far northern forbidden land, where her adventure begins…

  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: "Enze: The Unbidden Grace" is an action-adventure game. Is divine grace always a blessing? In the far north of a planet reborn after an apocalyptic disaster, a golden tower hides the secrets of creation and destruction. Enze answers an unknown call and begins a journey into the unknown.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
